New Records: Arthur Masuaku scored his third goal for DR Congo in his 26th appearance
Key Match Events: DR Congo came from behind to lead 2-1, with Masuaku scoring the winning goal with a free-kick in the 82nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: The win sees DR Congo secure their place in the semi-finals of AFCON
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo finished in second place in Group F having taken three points from their three group stage fixtures
